text: Olwa Musa yachelela khubandu bebe nasinyishe khandi nabelele, Yaboola mbu: “obubii buli burie buno bwamukholele inyuma wanje nindakharula? Koo muranjilile likhuwa lia Nyasaye wenyu,” Mana nasukuna tsimbao tsilia, mana natila omurwe kwo musiani wabu okhukhwesa ebuleka wuwe, (Haruni)naboola mbu: “Ewe Omwana wa mama wanje! Toto Abandu bandechele, kata babeele ahambi okhunzira, kho olasangasia abasuku okhubela esie tawe, nohomba olara esie halala nende Abandu ababii tawe.”
